description: This file defines an Angular service 'ApiService' that wraps the HttpClient for making HTTP requests to a backend API. It centralizes the base URL configuration, handles GET and POST requests, and manages error handling.

classes.name: ApiService
classes.description: An Angular service that wraps HttpClient for API communication, providing methods for GET and POST requests with centralized error handling.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Performs an HTTP GET request to the API with the specified path and options, returning an Observable of the response type.

methods.name: post
methods.description: Performs an HTTP POST request to the API with the specified path, request body, and options, returning an Observable of the response type.

methods.name: handleError
methods.description: Handles HTTP errors, logs the error, and returns an Observable that throws the error.
